gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Suns 116, Pistons 100
gameRecap.excerpt: The Suns defeated the Pistons 116-100. Kevin Durant recorded 25 points, six assists, and six rebounds for the Suns, with Saben Lee adding 16 points and six rebounds in the victory. Simone Fontecchio tallied 18 points and two steals for the Pistons in the defeat. The Suns improve 33-22, while the Pistons fall to 8-46.
